info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 3 at 4:28PM CDT until June 4 at 1:06PM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...
Walnut River near El Dorado affecting Butler County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Walnut River near El Dorado.
* WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Some flooding of low-lying areas and bottom land can be expected. Overflows especially on the upstream left bank will occur. Flood waters will impact Riverside Park by covering walk pathways and inundating playground equipment.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest around 19 feet just after midnight - Flood stage is 19.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 430 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON
